name: Blacephalon
author: kawayoo
flavor_text: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It’s apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

attacks.name: Blazer
attacks.effect: Turn 1 of your face-down Prize cards face up. If it’s a {R} Energy card, this attack does 50 more damage. (That Prize card remains face up for the rest of the game.)

attacks.name: Fireball Circus
attacks.effect: Discard any number of {R} Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 50 damage for each card you discarded in this way.
